name: Chemistry Lab Starter Kit
description: A beginner's chemistry lab kit with essential chemicals and equipment to perform basic experiments.

name: Robotics Engineering Kit
description: Build and program your own robots with this comprehensive robotics engineering kit.

name: Astronomy Discovery Set
description: Explore the wonders of the universe with this astronomy discovery set, including a telescope and stargazing guide.

name: Counting Blocks Set
description: A set of colorful counting blocks to help children learn basic math concepts and develop counting skills.

name: Math Puzzle Board
description: An interactive math puzzle board with various mathematical operations to enhance problem-solving abilities.

name: Shape Sorting Cube
description: A shape sorting cube toy that introduces children to different shapes, spatial awareness, and critical thinking.

name: Mechanical Engineering Set
description: A comprehensive mechanical engineering kit that allows kids to build various mechanical structures and learn engineering principles.

name: Electronics Discovery Kit
description: An electronics discovery kit that teaches the basics of circuitry and electronic components through hands-on experiments.

name: Civil Engineering Construction Set
description: Build bridges, towers, and other structures with this civil engineering construction set that introduces fundamental engineering concepts.
